Walk to the 2km long beautiful beach, explore the 565 acre forest with castle and themed gardens- bring your camera for the peacocks roaming around. Soak in the hot tub under a gazebo. Bbq lunch and sit on the patio in the sun. Maybe one of our kitties will keep you company while in the yard- truly a home away from home feel to your stay in Victoria!
The Guest studio sleeps 2 adults and has a `Flip chair` that turns into a comfy bed for a youth/child or twin sleeping matt for adult.
Want to surprise your honey? Add the romance package to your stay!
The Garden suite sleeps 3 to 4.

Inside you`ll find 370 sq ft of warm decor, a romantic four poster queen bed complete with a plush duvet. A lovely little seating area for snacks and a light meal and snack area complete with a small fridge, microwave coffee maker/kettle etc. For something a little more..a guest BBQ is down among the gardens and patios.
Rounding out the guest suite is a large walk in closet with dressing area and a private skylight lit large 5 pce bathroom including a large garden style soaking tub- it even has candles already there for you! Your private ensuite bath is large enough you could slow dance in there! Self contained- no sharing of space.
No cramped hotel room here!
Extras like bath robes for Mom and Dad , beach towels for the hot tub for all and even popcorn- are all there to enjoy for your home away from home stay!

postings.body:
** scam alert ** BEACH Rentals in NJ (& beyond)
SOMEONE IS POSTING BOGUS RENTALS ON CL --- The Beach / Vaca Rental property may be real BUT the post is NOT - they don`t own the property (dozens seen so far).
If they can`t SHOW you the property - it`s likely because They DON`T OWN IT! Beware.
This is becoming VERY common. CRAIG`S LIST is AWEFUL for this and any real estate transactions!!!! No protection or security - beware!!
NEVER send money via Bank Transfer, Western Union/Moneygram and use PayPAL very carefully. Bogus accounts and Scammers. Get references. Call people who have stayed before.
Get a complete contract and make sure you get an actual LANDLINE direct ph # for owners - NOT google voice type phone contacts only! Tell-Tale signs of a scam.
Again -
They do NOT have anything to do with the property and YOU will be OUT ALL $.
SCAM ALERT ---- SCAM ALERT ----- SCAM ALERT ---- SCAM ALERT
Don`t send them ANY $.

annotations.source_heading: Single Women`s Bedroom Available at the Village

postings.heading: Single Womens Bedroom Available at the Village

postings.body:
This is a really nice apartment complex with a beautiful courtyard setting.
I am looking to share a 2 bedroom, 2 bath apartment in Brentwood/Los Angeles, CA. I am looking for a mature woman but I might consider a mature male as long as he is kind and respectful of me.
The bedroom that is available is about 9 x 12 and has a large closet which runs the width of the room with shelving on top and on the left side of the closet for more storage. The furniture shown in the picture is not included. You will have to provide your own bed and furniture.
Rent is $800/month PLUS utilities. Utilities are $100/month and that includes Cable, Internet, WIFI and Electricity. So the total amount due on the 1st of every month is $900.
A Security Deposit of $750 is required prior to move in.
There is a Cable for TV available for your bedroom. You may watch a movie or a TV show in the living room in moderation. All I ask is that you refrain from watching violence. I prefer to keep a peaceful, positive environment.
This is a month-to-month arrangement. I am planning on moving by the end of the year so if you decide you want to stay after December then you are welcome to apply to the management company to draw up a new lease in your name and live here by yourself or find a suitable roommate.
You have use of the main (shared) bathroom that has a full tub and shower with storage underneath the sink and also 2 drawers for your toiletries. This is a shared bathroom so it must be kept clean.
The room that is available is for one person only. I prefer to have a roommate who is mature and has a full-time job working outside of the home. I work from home so it just works best for my roommate to be working outside the home. In my spare time I like photography, astronomy and energy healing (I am a Reiki Master-Teacher). I also do meditation and am starting to do some Yoga so I encourage you to apply if you are interested in the same things.
You will need to fill out an application and provide a $25 credit check fee for the management of the building along with a copy of your driver`s license or state ID. They will need to approve your application before you can move in. This is standard procedure for all tenants living in this building.
Let me know if you would like to schedule a time to come look at the room. I can show you the room, bathroom and the common areas, the pool, and the laundry room. Then we both can decide if we would like to be roommates.
Thank you for your interest and I wish you luck in your search.
